NK001(ka)036:0: snga 'gyur sdom rgyun mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar nyung gsal sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)036:1: mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i sdom rgyun smad 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)036:2: mkhan brgyud kyi rnam thar yid ches ngo mtshar ba'i
NK001(ka)036:3: gtam nyung gsal sgron me zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)036:4: ston pa bcom ldan 'das sras dang slob mar bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)036:5: thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi lhar gyur pa //
NK001(ka)036:6: thub chen 'gro ba'i bla ma zas gtsang sras //
NK001(ka)036:7: gang gi ring lugs zhing 'dir gsal mdzad pa //
NK001(ka)036:8: mkhan chen zhi 'tsho brgyud par bcas la 'du. //
NK001(ka)036:9: thabs mkhas shing rtas gdul bya thar gling dang //
NK001(ka)036:10: 'khrid mkhas mkhan brgyud rim par byon pa'i tshul //
NK001(ka)036:11: nyung ngu'i ngag gis yid ches ngo mtshar gtam //
NK001(ka)036:12: rgya chen gsal nus legs bshad sgron me bya //
NK001(ka)036:13: de la 'dir phan bde'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi
NK001(ka)036:14: bstan pa'i gzhi ma so sor thar pa'i sdom rgyun
NK001(ka)036:15: ni bod yul gyi 'dul ba 'dzin pa thams cad
NK001(ka)036:16: sde pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i lugs
NK001(ka)036:17: gcig pu yin / . ltar na'ng sdom rgyun rim pa gsum byung ste /
NK001(ka)036:19: mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i sdom rgyun bstan pa'i nyi
NK001(ka)036:20: ma bla chen po la brgyud pa smad 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)036:22: shar phyogs kyi pan+di ta d+har+m+aa p+aa la nas p+aa
NK001(ka)036:23: la rnam gsum sogs la brgyud pa stod 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)036:25: kha che'i pan+di ta sh+aakya sh+r+ai nas byang rdor sa
NK001(ka)036:26: gsum la brgyud pa kha che'i lugs dang gsum las
NK001(ka)036:28: ri'i phreng ba ltar rim par byon tshul barjoda par
NK001(ka)036:29: / bya ste / de la thog mar bdag cag
NK001(ka)036:30: gi ston pa 'di bskal pa grangs med dpag tu
NK001(ka)036:31: med pa'i sngon rol tu sangs rgyas nas slar yang
NK001(ka)036:32: 'tshang rgya tshul ston pa sogs gang la gang 'dul
NK001(ka)036:33: gyi bkod pa tshad med par ston par gsungs pa
NK001(ka)036:34: / bya ste / dang / yang grangs med gsum
NK001(ka)036:35: gyi bar du slob lam bzhi'i mthar thug sa bcu
NK001(ka)036:36: pa man chad bgrod de 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sangs
NK001(ka)036:37: rgyas pa bzhin du bye ba phrag brgya'i zhing kun
NK001(ka)036:38: tu sku mnyam du bstan nas don mdzad par gsungs
NK001(ka)036:39: pa la sogs pa'i tshul du ma yod kyang /
NK001(ka)036:40: 'dir skabs su bab pa lung dang sngon 'byung sogs
NK001(ka)036:41: 'khor lo dang po'i bka' dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)036:42: las 'byung ba ni sngon rgyal po 'od ldan du
NK001(ka)036:43: gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa chen po'i
NK001(ka)036:45: . nas bzung ste tshogs lam gyi bsdus pa'i tshogs bskal pa grangs med gsum du bsags te /
NK001(ka)036:47: rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug /
NK001(ka)036:48: grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung //
NK001(ka)036:49: dang po sh+aakya thub pa yin //
NK001(ka)036:51: . nas bskal pa brgyar mtshan bzang gi rgyu bsgrubs
NK001(ka)036:52: nas dga' ldan gyi gnas su dam pa tog dkar
NK001(ka)036:53: por 'khrungs / . nas yul dang rigs dang dus
NK001(ka)036:54: dang brgyud dang bud med de lnga la gzigs nas
NK001(ka)036:55: chu stod zla ba'i nya la glang po che thal
NK001(ka)036:56: dkar gyi rnam pas yum gyi lhums su zhugs nas
NK001(ka)036:57: por 'khrungs / / zla ba bcu phal cher rdzogs
NK001(ka)036:58: par dpyid zla tha chung gi tshes bdun skar ma
NK001(ka)036:59: rgyal la babs pa na lum+bi'i nags tshal du bltams
NK001(ka)036:60: por 'khrungs / / te / sgyu rtsal gyis dregs
NK001(ka)036:61: pa can rnams tshar bcad nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang
NK001(ka)036:62: bcas te dgung lo nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du
NK001(ka)036:64: . nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhing lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de /
NK001(ka)036:65: rdo rje gdan du byang chub kyi shing drung du
NK001(ka)036:66: bzhugs nas dgung lo so lnga pa la sa ga
NK001(ka)036:67: zla ba'i nya'i srod la bdud btul zhing skya rengs
NK001(ka)036:69: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
NK001(ka)036:70: de'i tshe rang byung gi bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur to //
NK001(ka)036:71: .'ang tshogs lam chen po'i rten la sbyor lam drod
NK001(ka)036:72: nas zad mi-skye shes pa'i byang chub kyi bar stan
NK001(ka)036:73: thog gcig la mngon du mdzad pa ste /
NK001(ka)036:75: ston dang bse ru byang chub pa //
NK001(ka)036:76: bsam gtan mthar brten gcig la kun //
NK001(ka)036:77: . yi sngon du thar cha mthun //
NK001(ka)036:79: . nas zhag zhe dgu 'das pa chu stod zla
NK001(ka)036:80: ba'i tshes bzhi la w+aa r+aa na s+air lnga sde
NK001(ka)036:81: las brtsams te bden bzhi'i chos kyi 'khor lo bzlas
NK001(ka)036:82: pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bas lnga sdes
NK001(ka)036:84: lha brgyad khris bden pa mthong /
NK001(ka)036:85: . nas nye ba'i lnga sde la sogs pa nas
NK001(ka)036:86: rab bzang gi bar btul te dgung lo brgyad cu
NK001(ka)036:87: pa sa ga'i nya la gyad yul r+ts+wa mchog gi
NK001(ka)036:88: gnas shing s+aa la zung gi tshal du phung po
NK001(ka)036:89: lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das
NK001(ka)036:91: . ltar ston pa sangs rgyas las sdom rgyun ji ltar brgyud tshul ni /
NK001(ka)036:93: gang phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni //
NK001(ka)036:94: gzhan yang bye brag smra bar barjo. //
NK001(ka)036:95: ji ltar gnas pa mkhyen pas na //
NK001(ka)036:96: 'dren pa rang rgyal rang byung gis //
NK001(ka)036:98: lnga sde rnams ni nges pa las //
NK001(ka)036:99: gang zhig slob ma bzang sde rnams //
NK001(ka)036:100: thams cad skyabs su 'gro bas thob //
NK001(ka)036:101: pho nya yis ni mchod sbyin ma //
NK001(ka)036:102: tshur shog dge slong zhes byas kyang //
NK001(ka)036:103: ston par khas blangs pa las ni //
NK001(ka)036:104: dge- slong 'od srung bdag nyid che //
NK001(ka)036:105: dri bas mnyes pa nyid kyis ni //
NK001(ka)036:106: slob ma legs sbyin de bzhin no //
NK001(ka)036:108: bsnyen rdzogs yang dag bstan pa ni //
NK001(ka)036:109: bcu dang lnga yi tshogs kyis sam //
NK001(ka)036:110: de las lhag pas kyang nas rung //
NK001(ka)036:111: de bzhin 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi //
NK001(ka)036:112: goo'u ta ma lci chos kyi //
NK001(ka)036:113: zhes bsnyen par rdzogs tshul bcu gsungs pa las /
NK001(ka)036:114: rang byung gi bsnyen rdzogs ni /
NK001(ka)036:115: yul gzhan la ma brten par srid pa tha ma
NK001(ka)036:116: pa'i gang zag zad mi skye shes pa'i byang chub
NK001(ka)036:117: brnyes pa'i tshe rang gi ngang gis rdzogs pa yin
NK001(ka)036:118: la / 'phrin dang bcu'am lnga'i tshogs kyis rdzogs pa
NK001(ka)036:119: gnyis ni cho ga'i rigs byed la bsten pa yin
NK001(ka)036:120: la / zhing / . lhag bdun po ston pa'i
NK001(ka)036:121: thugs rje la brten nas rang gi ngang gis bsnyen
NK001(ka)036:122: par rdzogs pa yin pas yul ston pa sangs rgyas
NK001(ka)036:123: la brten pa'i bsnyen rdzogs te de las 'dir ni
NK001(ka)036:124: tshur shog gi sgo nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa sh+aa
NK001(ka)036:125: ri'i bu las brgyud pa yin no //
NK001(ka)036:126: de las shes rab can gyi mchog 'phags pa sh+aa ri'i bu ni /
NK001(ka)036:127: yab bram ze skar rgyal dang /
NK001(ka)036:128: yum bram ze mo sh+aa ri ka'i sras su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:129: mtshan kun tu rgyu nye rgyal /
NK001(ka)036:130: chung ngu nas rig byed thams cad la mkhas /
NK001(ka)036:131: mkhan po yang dag rgyal ba'i- thad du tshangs par spyod cing /
NK001(ka)036:133: mkhan po 'das khar sangs rgyas las rab tu phyungs shig ces kha chems bzhag pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:134: rgyal po'i khab tu song ba na 'phags pa rta thul mthong bas dad de /
NK001(ka)036:137: su'i chos la dga' zhes dris pa la a lan btab pas /
NK001(ka)036:138: nye rgyal gyis de'i chos ston cig /
NK001(ka)036:140: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /
NK001(ka)036:141: zhes sogs gsungs pas rgyun zhugs kyi 'bras bu thob
NK001(ka)036:142: ste bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku mthong na'ng
NK001(ka)036:143: / gzugs kyi sku blta ba'i phyir 'gro'i zhes moo'u- gal gyi bu dang 'grogs nas song ba las /
NK001(ka)036:144: bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa mthong nas lhag par dad par gyur /
NK001(ka)036:145: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK001(ka)036:146: dge slong dag tshur shog la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad par spyod cig ces gsungs pa tsam gyis /
NK001(ka)036:147: skra dang kha spu rang byi chos gos gsum gyon
NK001(ka)036:148: zhing lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs
NK001(ka)036:149: pa bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta
NK001(ka)036:150: bu'i spyod lam shin tu dul bar gyur te tshur
NK001(ka)036:151: shog gi sgo nas bsnyen par rdzogs so //
NK001(ka)036:152: de'i tshe bar snang gi lhas /
NK001(ka)036:153: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
NK001(ka)036:154: skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan gyur //
NK001(ka)036:155: mod la dbang po rab zhi gnas gyur te //
NK001(ka)036:156: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur //
NK001(ka)036:158: . nas zla ba phyed 'das pa na bcom ldan
NK001(ka)036:159: 'das kyis kun tu rgyu sen ring la chos bstan
NK001(ka)036:160: pas chos mig thob cig tshur shog gi dge slong
NK001(ka)036:161: du gyur pa'i tshe chos de thos pas sh+aa ri
NK001(ka)036:162: bus kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bsnyen
NK001(ka)036:163: par gyur to // de'i mkhan bu ston pa'i sras 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po ni /
NK001(ka)036:164: yab rgyal bu don grub ste rab tu byung khar
NK001(ka)036:165: grags 'dzin ma'i mngal du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das
NK001(ka)036:166: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe bltams shing de'i tshe zla ba
NK001(ka)036:167: sgra gcan gyis zin pas khye'u'i ming sgra gcan 'dzin
NK001(ka)036:168: du btags / lo drug pa la bcom ldan 'das
NK001(ka)036:169: btsun mo'i khyim du gdugs tshod la byin pa'i tshe
NK001(ka)036:170: zhabs phyir 'brangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal
NK001(ka)036:171: nas 'phags pa sh+aa ri'i bu las rab tu byung
NK001(ka)036:172: ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:173: ston pa las chos mang du blangs shing bsgrubs pas
NK001(ka)036:174: gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom
NK001(ka)036:175: gyur te / thub pa chen pos bka' bsgos pa
NK001(ka)036:176: bzhin du sku tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs nas
NK001(ka)036:177: 'khor dgra bcom pa stong chig brgya dang bcas te
NK001(ka)036:178: pri yang+ku'i gling na bstan pa skyong bzhin du bzhugs
NK001(ka)036:179: gyur te / so // de'i mkhan bu bram ze'i btsun pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po ni /
NK001(ka)036:180: yul o di bi shar bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:181: gzhon nu nas rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)036:182: dang rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad sogs la mkhas pas
NK001(ka)036:183: bram ze'i khye'u rnams la gsang tshig klog cing gsan
NK001(ka)036:184: pa las / nam zhig rdo rje rnal 'byor mas byin gyis brlabs pas nang gi nus pa brnyes /
NK001(ka)036:185: de'i tshe bram ze rnams kyis myos byed gsol ba
NK001(ka)036:186: la brten nas dma' dbab par 'dod pa na thams
NK001(ka)036:188: . nas yul dbus su byon te 'phags pa sgra
NK001(ka)036:189: gcan 'dzin bzang po las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen
NK001(ka)036:190: par rdzogs / ring po ma thogs par dge slong
NK001(ka)036:191: sde snod 'dzin pa ches mchog tu gyur nas sngon
NK001(ka)036:192: 'phags pa sh+aa ri'i bu 'khrungs pa'i sar gtsug lag
NK001(ka)036:193: khang brtsigs pa n+aa len+d+rara grags pa ste thog mar
NK001(ka)036:194: mya ngan med- kyis brtsigs shing de rjes tho btsun
NK001(ka)036:195: sku mched kyis chos gzhi dar bar mdzad pa de'i
NK001(ka)036:196: mkhan por gyur nas bstan pa ches cher rgyas par
NK001(ka)036:197: par rdzogs / mdzad / phyis rig pa brtul zhugs kyi spyod pas yul kun tu rgyu ba na /
NK001(ka)036:198: ma ra ha tar zhing gi rnal 'byor ma mda'
NK001(ka)036:199: mkhan gyi bu mo'i tshul du gzigs te de nyid
NK001(ka)036:200: phyag rgyar brten pas mda' bsrang ba'i brda thabs kyis
NK001(ka)036:201: kyang ngo sprad ba ltar gyur te mchog gi dngos
NK001(ka)036:202: grub brnyes / mtshan yang sa ra har grags te /
NK001(ka)036:203: . ha rdo rje'i glu mang du mdzad cing dpal
NK001(ka)036:204: gyi ri la gshegs nas da lta'anga bzhugs zhes zer
NK001(ka)036:205: la / yang sku lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du bzhud pa yin yang gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:206: slob dpon 'di'i sku tshe'i ring la sher phyin 'bum
NK001(ka)036:207: pa ma gtogs theg chen gyi mdo sde phal che
NK001(ka)036:209: de'i mkhan bu 'phags pa klu sgrub ni /
NK001(ka)036:210: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya
NK001(ka)036:211: na lho phyogs bee dar+b+hara bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs
NK001(ka)036:212: / ltas mkhan gyis skye bo brgya bram ze brgya
NK001(ka)036:213: dge slong brgya rnams la ston mo drangs na rim
NK001(ka)036:214: / par zhag bdun / zla ba bdun /
NK001(ka)036:216: de las lhag pa'i thabs med zer ba ltar pha mas kyang tshul bzhin bsgrubs nas /
NK001(ka)036:217: . srid du rig byed kyang mkhas par bslab /
NK001(ka)036:218: dus de rnams rdzogs su nye ba na g.yog dang bcas te 'khyams su btang bas n+aa len+d+rara sleb /
NK001(ka)036:219: mkhan po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis tshe dpag med kyi
NK001(ka)036:220: rig sngags bzlar bcug pas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las
NK001(ka)036:221: grol / .ra rab tu byung nas theg pa che chung gi sde snod mtha' dag dang /
NK001(ka)036:222: rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas par sbyang /
NK001(ka)036:223: lo lon nas sngar gyi mkhan po las bsnyen par rdzogs te bstan pa bskyang /
NK001(ka)036:224: .bu ma'i tshul lugs dar bar mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:225: nyan thos rnams la'ng phan cher btags /
NK001(ka)036:226: khyad par du dge tshul slong bslab 'chal mang po
NK001(ka)036:227: dge 'dun gyi nang na dbang chen gyis gnas pa
NK001(ka)036:228: thams cad bskrad pas stong phrag brgyad tsam byung bar
NK001(ka)036:229: grags / sde pa kun gyi bdag po mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:230: bcud len sogs thun mong gi dngos grub mang po
NK001(ka)036:231: dang bsad gso sogs kyi nus pa thams cad kyang
NK001(ka)036:232: grub / n+aa len+d+rara theg chen gyi chos smra ba
NK001(ka)036:233: lnga brgya la lo mang por gser 'gyur gyi rtsi'i
NK001(ka)036:234: sbyor ba la brten te 'tsho ba sbyar /
NK001(ka)036:235: rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags grub pas klu yul
NK001(ka)036:236: du byon nas yun ring por bzhugs shing chos gsungs
NK001(ka)036:237: / sher phyin rgyas pa sogs spyan drangs te mi yul du byon /
NK001(ka)036:238: }ra mtshan dge slong dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya
NK001(ka)036:239: ba yin pa las de phyin klu sgrub ces grags
NK001(ka)036:240: / rigs tshogs sogs bstan bcos kyang mang du mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:241: mu stegs pa'i rgol ba dang theg chen la sdang
NK001(ka)036:242: ba'i dge slong bde byed sogs rtsod pas tshar bcad
NK001(ka)036:243: / lha khang dang mchod rten gyis kyang sa phyogs thams cad khyab par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:244: phyis dpal gyi ri la lo nyis brgya tsam gnod
NK001(ka)036:245: sbyin mo rnams kyis 'khor dang bcas te sngags spyod
NK001(ka)036:246: kyis bzhugs pas mchog gi dngos grub brnyes te sku
NK001(ka)036:247: la mtshan bzang po so gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur
NK001(ka)036:248: / rgyal po bde byed kyi bu chung ngu su
NK001(ka)036:249: shak+ti'i don du mgul ku shas bcad de dbu sbyin
NK001(ka)036:250: par btang nas bde ba can du gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:251: gang dag bram ze sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mkhan po
NK001(ka)036:252: gnas brtan nag po ba bya ba yin zhes 'byung
NK001(ka)036:253: ba dang / klu sgrub kyi mkhan po dri ma
NK001(ka)036:254: med pa'i gzi brjid can zhes sbyor lam pa zhig
NK001(ka)036:255: ba dang / yinazhesa ba dang / sgra gcan 'dzin
NK001(ka)036:256: gnyis kyi bar du theg chen dpal gyi grags pa
NK001(ka)036:257: zhes bya ba brgyud dgos gsungs na'ng /
NK001(ka)036:258: }ra gyi mkhan brgyud snga phyi thams cad kyi lo rgyus la 'dir bshad pa ltar yod cing /
NK001(ka)036:265: bo d+hi sa t+wa rnams bsam yas kyi gyang ris
NK001(ka)036:266: la yod ces kun mkhyen bu ston gsung bas kyang
NK001(ka)036:267: 'di kho nar dag par sems so //
NK001(ka)036:268: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mkhan bu slob dpon leg ldan 'byed ni /
NK001(ka)036:269: yul lho phyogs ma la yar rgyal rigs su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:270: klu sgrub las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:271: sde snod gsum la mkhas par gyur /
NK001(ka)036:272: ting nge 'dzin khyad par can yang grub /
NK001(ka)036:273: lho phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang lnga bcu tsam gyi bdag po mdzad de bstan pa bskyangs /
NK001(ka)036:274: .bu ma rtsa ba shes rab la sangs rgyas bskyangs kyis bzhed pa sun phyungs te 'grel pa mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:275: dge slong stong phrag du ma rjes su 'brangs pas lugs de shin tu dar bar gyur /
NK001(ka)036:276: ril bu'i dngos grub bsgrubs pas grub cing /
NK001(ka)036:277: mthar rnam smin gyi sku lus bor nas rigs sngags 'chang gi gnas su gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:278: de'i mkhan bu slob dpon dpal sbas ni /
NK001(ka)036:279: yul shar phyogs pa slob dpon legs ldan 'byed las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:280: gsung rab mtha' dag la sbyangs pas shin tu mkhas /
NK001(ka)036:281: rang rgyud gong ma'i grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i dbu ma pa chen por gyur /
NK001(ka)036:282: nyan thos dang phyi rol pa'i rgol ba thams cad smra bas zil gyis mnan //
NK001(ka)036:283: ga pa chen po'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa rgyas par mdzad do //
NK001(ka)036:284: de'i mkhan bu slob dpon ye shes snying po ni /
NK001(ka)036:285: o di bi sha'i yul du 'khrungs shing /
NK001(ka)036:286: chung ngu nas rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag la mkhas
NK001(ka)036:287: par gyur pa zhig b+hang+ga lar dpal sbas kyi drung
NK001(ka)036:288: du byon te / rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas chos nyan pas /
NK001(ka)036:289: legs ldan 'byed kyi srol 'dzin dbu ma pa chen por 'gyur /
NK001(ka)036:290: .bu ma bden gnyis la sogs bstan bcos kyang mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:291: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs yun ring por bsgrubs pas
NK001(ka)036:292: mthar yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lor bsgyur ba zhal
NK001(ka)036:293: gzigs te mngon shes kyang grub /
NK001(ka)036:294: mdo sde du ma thugs nas 'don zhing mu stegs
NK001(ka)036:295: kyi rgol ba rnams kyang rtsod pas pham par mdzad
NK001(ka)036:296: pa yin no // de'i mkhan bu gangs can bstan pa'i nyi ma +aa tsar blo d+hi sat+wa ni /
NK001(ka)036:297: shar phyogs b+had+ga la'i yul du sa ho ra'i rigs su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:298: slob dpon ye shes snying po las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:299: mtshan yongs grags sh+aan+ta rak+shi ta ste zhi ba 'atsho'am /
NK001(ka)036:300: d+har+m+aa sh+aan+ti g+ho sha ste chos kyi zhi ba'i dbyangs zhes kyang bya /
NK001(ka)036:301: thun mong gi sde snod gsum dang khyad par theg
NK001(ka)036:302: pa chen po'i mdo sde thams cad thugs su chu.
NK001(ka)036:303: / rig pa'i gnas su gyur pa mthar dag kyang mkhyen par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:304: lhag par rang rgyud gong ma'i rig lugs 'dzin pa'i dbu ma ba chen por gyur /
NK001(ka)036:305: .bu ma rgyan la sogs pa'i bstan bcos kyang mdzad
NK001(ka)036:306: de 'phags yul du bstan pa yun rings su bskyangs
NK001(ka)036:307: / . nas sprul pa'i rgyal po khri srong lde'u
NK001(ka)036:308: btsan gyis bod yul du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
NK001(ka)036:310: sang shi dang gsal snang gis rgya nag tu phyin
NK001(ka)036:311: te chos bam po stong tsam blangs kyang ma zhang
NK001(ka)036:313: phyis rba gsal snang mang yul gyi khad dpon la bskos pas /
NK001(ka)036:314: .ra gtsug lag khang gnyis brtsigs shing rkyen ris kyang bcad /
NK001(ka)036:315: bal por mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho bzhugs pa mjal du phyin nas sems bskyed zhus /
NK001(ka)036:316: bod yul du 'byon par gsol bas /
NK001(ka)036:317: bod nga'i gdul zhing yin yang khri srong lde'u btsan dang khyod ma skyes pas /
NK001(ka)036:318: ngas 'di na bod kyi rgyal rabs dgu'i bar du sgug gin bsdad pa yin /
NK001(ka)036:319: da khyod gnyis kyang nar son pas 'o skol rnams
NK001(ka)036:320: kyis bod du bstan pa 'dzugs pa'i dus la bab
NK001(ka)036:321: ces gsungs / . nas rdo rje gdan du ma
NK001(ka)036:322: h+aa bo d+hi la mchod pa chen po byed du
NK001(ka)036:323: ces gsungs / phyin / slar log ste dbus su 'ong nas /
NK001(ka)036:324: btsan po la mkhan po'i gsung rnams gsol bas /
NK001(ka)036:325: btsan po'i zhal nas ma zhang gis chad pa bcad dogs yod pas khyod rang myur du song /
NK001(ka)036:326: ngas lkog tu 'gos rgan dang gros byas nas thabs kyis spyan 'dren du btang gi gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:327: . nas 'gos rgan gyis g.yo chen pos ma zhang gson dur du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)036:328: pho nya mngags pas gsal snang gis mkhan po spyan drangs nas lha sar chags phebs /
NK001(ka)036:329: btsan pos blon po rnams la +aa tsar+ya de ji
NK001(ka)036:330: ltar 'dug ltos la shog cig bzang po zhig 'dug
NK001(ka)036:332: blon po rnams kyis phyin te dris pas mkhan po'i zhal nas /
NK001(ka)036:333: kho bo'i chos lugs ni rigs pas brtags nas gang 'thad pa de bye. /
NK001(ka)036:334: mi 'thad pa de mi byed pa yin gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:335: .ra rgyal blon mthun pa spyan drangs te 'om bu'i tshal du mjal /
NK001(ka)036:336: btsan pos phyag mdzad pa'i tshe +aa tsar+ya'i zhal nas /
NK001(ka)036:337: 'o skol 'od srung gi bstan pa la bal po'i
NK001(ka)036:338: mchod rten gyi drung du bod du dam chos spel
NK001(ka)036:339: bar smon lam btab pa de rgyal pos bsnyel lam
NK001(ka)036:340: gsungs pa'i lan du ma 'tshal zhus pa na mkhan
NK001(ka)036:341: pos byin gyis brlabs te btsan pos sngon gyi skye
NK001(ka)036:342: ba yang dag par rjes su dran /
NK001(ka)036:343: . nas pho brang rlung 'tshubs kyi yang thog tu dar gyi gur phub par bzhug su bcug /
NK001(ka)036:344: zla ba bzhir kha che +aa nan+tasa lo ts+aa byas
NK001(ka)036:345: nas btsan po la dge ba bcu dang rten 'brel
NK001(ka)036:346: bcu gnyis khams bco brgyad rnams las brtsams te chos
NK001(ka)036:347: bshad pas / bod 'dre rnams khros te pho brang phang thang chus khyer /
NK001(ka)036:348: dmar po ri'i pho brang la thog brgyab /
NK001(ka)036:349: yul khams rnams su lo nyes dang mi nad chen po byung bas /
NK001(ka)036:350: bod 'bangs thams cad kyis chos byas pas lan zer chos byar ma btub nas /
NK001(ka)036:351: btsan pos mkhan po la gser phye bre gang gi yon lan gsum phul nas /
NK001(ka)036:352: 'di skad ces +aa tsar+ya re zhig bal yul du bzhud la /
NK001(ka)036:353: . bar bod mi- rnams lha chos mi byed du mi rung bar glengs shing barngana pa re sbyin /
NK001(ka)036:354: zhang blon rnams thabs kyis brid nas chos byar btub pa'i tshe slar spyan 'dren no zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:356: bod kyi 'dre srin 'dul ba la slob dpon pad+ma
NK001(ka)036:357: pam b+ha wa bya ba da lta sa steng na
NK001(ka)036:358: mthu che shes te spyan drangs na btsan po'i bsam
NK001(ka)036:359: pa 'grub gsung / gser 'khyor ba gang bal po'i rgyal pos sbyin dgos gsungs nas bsnams /
NK001(ka)036:360: lhag ma rnams btsan po la gtad de phyi ltar
NK001(ka)036:361: na bskrad pa ltar byas te gsal snang dang lang
NK001(ka)036:362: gro sna ras pal yul gyi bar du bskyal /
NK001(ka)036:363: slar log nas gsal snang chos kyi spyan par bskos
NK001(ka)036:364: te 'khor sum cu dang bcas rgya nag tu pho
NK001(ka)036:365: nyar phyin / . bar zhang blon thams cad bsdus
NK001(ka)036:366: nas chos byed pa'i chas so grub ba'i tshe rgya
NK001(ka)036:367: rjes pho nya rnams la bya dga' chen po dang
NK001(ka)036:368: nyar phyin / / btsan po la dar yug khri phrag sogs skyes mang po dang bcas te sleb /
NK001(ka)036:369: . nas bal yul du spyan 'dren gyi pho nya btang bas /
NK001(ka)036:370: slob dpon rnam gnyis byon te slob dpon chen po pad+mas bod 'dre thams cad btul nas /
NK001(ka)036:371: da phyin chad lha chos ci dar mdzo. /
NK001(ka)036:372: gtsug lag khang dgongs pa bzhin du brtsigs shig gsungs pa ltar /
NK001(ka)036:373: bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs pas lo lnga la legs par 'byongs /
NK001(ka)036:374: . rjes bi kra ma sh+ai la'i gtsug lag khang
NK001(ka)036:375: nas gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge slong
NK001(ka)036:378: +aa tsar+ya bo d+hi sat+wasa mkhan po mdzad de sad
NK001(ka)036:379: mi mi bdun rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)036:380: / . nas kyang dad pa can dang shes rab
NK001(ka)036:381: can mang po rab tu byung nas khri srong gi
NK001(ka)036:382: ring la bod kyi yul 'dir chos grwa chen po
NK001(ka)036:383: / bcu gnyis dang / yer pa 108dang yer pa'i
NK001(ka)036:384: sgom chen brgya dang brgyad las dpal gyi rdo rje
NK001(ka)036:385: ma gtogs thams cad 'od lus su grub bo //
NK001(ka)036:386: las rgyu 'bras 'di ha cang gis skrag gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:388: chu bo ri 108dang mchims phu 25rnams su sgom grwa
NK001(ka)036:389: chen po re btsugs te rab byung thams cad kyi
NK001(ka)036:391: }gas mtshan nyid kyi chos phal mo che bsgyur zhing nyan bshad kyis gtan la phab /
NK001(ka)036:392: mkhas pa dang grub pa brnyes pa'i skyes bus gangs can gyi yul thams cad mdzes par byas so //
NK001(ka)036:393: dus phyis jo bo d+ai pam ka ras bsam yas su phebs nas pe har gling du bzhugs /
NK001(ka)036:394: rgya dpe mang po 'dug pa gzigs pas shin tu dgyes te /
NK001(ka)036:395: }na bod du bstan pa byung ba 'dra ba rgya
NK001(ka)036:396: gar du yang ma byung bar 'dug ces basngagasa pa
NK001(ka)036:397: mdzad / mkhan po dgung lo dgu brgya bzhes pa'i
NK001(ka)036:398: tshe bod yul du byon zhes grags pa ni mkhan
NK001(ka)036:399: po nyid lha tho tho ri gnyan btsan dang dus
NK001(ka)036:400: mnyam dang dus mnyam pa tsam byas na bod du
NK001(ka)036:401: phebs pa'i bar la rags rtsis lo bzhi brgya lhag
NK001(ka)036:402: tsam song bas dgu brgya zhes pa ni phyed lo
NK001(ka)036:404: . ltar na tho tho ri'i dus lo ts+aa ba
NK001(ka)036:405: li the ses spyan drangs pa'i pan+di ta blo sems
NK001(ka)036:406: 'tsho zhes pa de yang blo sems dang /
NK001(ka)036:407: 'tsho zhes pa zhi 'tsho la 'byor ba mkhan po yin par /
NK001(ka)036:408: 'gos lo ts+aa chen po'i bzhed pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:409: bod kyi rgyal rabs dgu'i bar khri srong sgug gin bzhugs pa sogs dang yang sgrig nus so //
NK001(ka)036:410: . nas bod kyi yul 'dir yang lo bzhi bcu'i bar du bstan par bskyangs /
NK001(ka)036:411: mthar brag dmar gyi pho brang du rtas phra brgyab
NK001(ka)036:412: pas rkyen byas te sku gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas
NK001(ka)036:413: sku gdung has po ri'i rgyab tu mchod rten bzhengs
NK001(ka)036:414: par bzhugs su gsol rab byung gi sde dbyar mtsho
NK001(ka)036:415: ltar 'phel zhing rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir du mchod
NK001(ka)036:416: rten gyi shar phyogs su sku gdung 'jog pa yin
NK001(ka)036:418: de'i mkhan bu rba rat+na ni /
NK001(ka)036:419: yul yar lung pa yin zer /
NK001(ka)036:421: +aa tsar+ya bo d+hi sat+wa sogs las chos mang du
NK001(ka)036:422: slob pa'i zhang blon dad pa dang shes rab phun
NK001(ka)036:423: sum tshogs bar mnga' ba zhig yin /
NK001(ka)036:424: nam zhig gi tshe btsan po'i zhal nas /
NK001(ka)036:425: nga'i bod la dge slong med pas nga'i zhang blon dag la dge slong btub bam zhes zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:427: btub bam sad par bya gsungs te /
NK001(ka)036:428: lug gi lo dpyid la ra ba'i tshes brgyad kyi nyin +aa ts+aar+ya- zhi ba 'tshos mkhan po /
NK001(ka)036:430: dzi na mi tra gnyis kyis las slob dang gsang ston /
NK001(ka)036:431: 0n+di ta gzhan bcu pos kha skong byas te /
NK001(ka)036:432: bod mi la dad pa che ba rba khri gzigs
NK001(ka)036:433: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs ma thag lha'i
NK001(ka)036:434: mngon shes dang ldan pas btsan po dgyes te /
NK001(ka)036:435: de'i zhabs spyi bor blangs nas khyod bod kyi rat+na
NK001(ka)036:436: yin no zhes bka' stsal pas mtshan rba rat+na zhes
NK001(ka)036:437: grags / mtshan dngos dpal dbyangs yin zhes rba bzhed che ba nas 'byung gsungs te /
NK001(ka)036:438: bod kyi rab tu byung ba la snga ba 'di yin no //
NK001(ka)036:439: btsan pos da dung rab tu byungs shig zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:440: sad par bgyi gsungs nas rba gsal snang dang pa
NK001(ka)036:441: gor he 'dod kyi bu sogs rab tu byung zhing
NK001(ka)036:442: / mtshan ye shes dbang po dang bee ro tsa na rak+shi ta sogs btags par bshad /
NK001(ka)036:443: . nas rba rat+na gnas brtan sde snod 'dzin pa
NK001(ka)036:444: chen por gyur nas bsam yas kyi pra ti ha
NK001(ka)036:445: na'i mchod pa chen po'i dus su dad pa can
NK001(ka)036:446: sum brgya tsam rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po mdzad
NK001(ka)036:447: pa sogs bstan pa'i bya ba rgya chen pos yun
NK001(ka)036:448: ring du bskyangs pa'i mthar jo mo yid bzhin 'khor
NK001(ka)036:449: los sgyur ba'i sku gzugs kyis spyan chab phyung ba
NK001(ka)036:450: sogs ngo mtshar ba'i rtags mang po bstan nas sku
NK001(ka)036:451: gshegs so // de'i mkhan bu ni bstan pa phyi
NK001(ka)036:452: dar gyi rtsa ba smar g.yo gtsang gsum zhes grags
NK001(ka)036:453: shing grub pa de nyid yin te /
NK001(ka)036:454: 'dzad kyi gyer mi gtsang rab gsal /
NK001(ka)036:456: stod lung ba smar sh+aakya mu ni gsum gyis rba
NK001(ka)036:457: rat+na las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas
NK001(ka)036:460: cog gru klu dang rang gi mkhan po sogs las
NK001(ka)036:461: gsung rab la sbyangs pas dge slong sde snod 'dzin
NK001(ka)036:463: dpal chu bo ri'i sgom grwa na bsam gtan sgom zhing bzhugs pa las /
NK001(ka)036:464: lcags bya la khri'u dum btsan dar mas bstan pa
NK001(ka)036:465: bsnubs pa'i tshe karma sha tam sogs 'dul mngon gyi
NK001(ka)036:466: dpe cha dgos pa rnams khyer nas /
NK001(ka)036:467: dang por stod phyogs la bros /
NK001(ka)036:468: rgyal po'i khrims kyis khyab pas 'jigs te nyin par
NK001(ka)036:469: yib cing mtshan mo lam bcad de song bas mnga'
NK001(ka)036:470: ris su sleb / .ra yang bzhugs ma nus par
NK001(ka)036:471: gar log nas thon te byang stod brgyud hor yul
NK001(ka)036:472: ris su sleb / du bros / hor gyi dge
NK001(ka)036:473: bsnyen sh+aakya shes rab la brten nas bzhugs te bstan
NK001(ka)036:474: pa dar bar byed dgos snyam nas 'bad kyang dar
NK001(ka)036:475: bar ma nus pas mdo smad lho ngos kyi be
NK001(ka)036:476: ri tsha mtsho nas tshur thon te /
NK001(ka)036:477: rma chu'i brgyud mdo smad kyi dan tig shel gyi yang dgon du sgom zhing bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)036:478: . nas gtsang rab gsal gyi mkhan bu bla chen po ni /
NK001(ka)036:479: skye ba snga ma rgyal po'i chos blon 'bro stag
NK001(ka)036:480: snang khrid gsum rje zhes pa zhig gi lo so
NK001(ka)036:481: lnga pa la smon lam btab nas tshe 'phos pa
NK001(ka)036:482: yin zer / .na la byang chub sems dpa' smon
NK001(ka)036:483: lam gyi mthu can zhig chu pho byi ba'i lo
NK001(ka)036:484: la yul tsong kha bde khams su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:485: mtshan mu zi gsal 'bar du btags /
NK001(ka)036:486: chung ngu nas rigs sad de non 'jam dpal las bzlas lung blangs /
NK001(ka)036:487: khang rin chen rdo rje las byang chub tu sems bskye. /
NK001(ka)036:489: nam dga' ldan las yo ga gsan nas mkhyen par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:490: nam zhig rma chu kha'i phyugs rjis smar g.yo gtsang gsum dan tig na bzhugs pa mthong nas /
NK001(ka)036:491: 'di ltar 'dug ces mi rnams la smras pa thos te /
NK001(ka)036:492: mu zi gsal 'bar gyis bltar phyin pas mthong tsam gyis dad nas /
NK001(ka)036:493: 'khor ba'i sdug basngala ba sal nas thar ba yi //
NK001(ka)036:494: bdud rtsis 'gro ba'i sdug basngala zhi byed pa'i //
NK001(ka)036:495: bstan pa phyogs bcur rgyas par bya ba'i phyir //
NK001(ka)036:496: dang por bdag gis rab tu dbyung bar bya //
NK001(ka)036:497: snyam du dgongs te rab tu byung par gsol bas /
NK001(ka)036:498: 'dul ba'i pu sti zhig gtad nas /
NK001(ka)036:499: 'di ltos la dad na rab tu byung bar bya'o gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:500: bltas pas ches dad de mchi ma phyungs nas zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:501: .ra gtsang gis mkhan po dang g.yos slob dpon byas te dge tshul du bsgrubs shing /
NK001(ka)036:502: mkhan slob kyi mtshan las grag te dge pa rab gsal du btags /
NK001(ka)036:503: phyis thugs rab che bas dgongs pa rab gsal du grags skad /
NK001(ka)036:504: . nas bsnyen rdzogs zhus pa las dge slong lnga ma tshang bas mi 'ong gsungs pa la /
NK001(ka)036:505: }ra lha lung dpal rdor can gsum klang thang na
NK001(ka)036:506: 'dug pa mthong nas 'tshol du phyin pas rnyed de
NK001(ka)036:507: / 'byon par zhus pas dpal gyi rdo rje'i gsung nas /
NK001(ka)036:508: ngas rgyal po sdig can dngos su gsad pas kha skong mi 'ong gi /
NK001(ka)036:509: ngas btsal la btang gis gsungs te /
NK001(ka)036:510: rgya nag gi dge slong nye wang dang gyi ban
NK001(ka)036:511: bya ba gnyis 'bad pas btsal bas rnyed de btang
NK001(ka)036:512: ngo // . nas sngar gyi mkhan slob gnyis kyis mkhan po dang las slob /
NK001(ka)036:514: rgya'i dge slong gnyis kyis kha skong byas nas bsnyen
NK001(ka)036:515: par rdzogs te ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa
NK001(ka)036:516: chen por gyur / 'dul ba'i bshad pa dang lag len la mkhas par sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:517: bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo lnga lon pa'i tshe /
NK001(ka)036:518: .bus gtsang gi mi bcu mdo khams su phyin nas gtsang la /
NK001(ka)036:520: nga rgan pas mkhan bu mi 'khyongs pas bla chen po la zhus shig gsungs pa ltar zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:521: ngas bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo lnga las ma lon
NK001(ka)036:522: pas mi btub gsungs pa la gtsang gi zhal nas
NK001(ka)036:523: / dmigs bsal la gang zag khyad par can gyis btub pas gyis gsungs te /
NK001(ka)036:524: bla chen gyis mkhan po mdzad nas chig rdzogs par mdzad do //
NK001(ka)036:525: de la nus pa can gyi mi bcu ni dbus
NK001(ka)036:526: nas klags pa lam pa klu- mes tshul khrims shes
NK001(ka)036:527: rab / gnyal ba pa 'bring ye shes yon tan /
NK001(ka)036:528: g.yo ru ba rba tshul khrims blo gros /
NK001(ka)036:530: sum pa ye shes blos gros dang lnga'o //
NK001(ka)036:531: gtsang nas mgur mong rab kha ba lo ston rdo rje dbang phyug /
NK001(ka)036:532: shab sgo lnga pa tshong btsun shes rab seng ge /
NK001(ka)036:533: mnga' ris pa 'o brgyad spun gnyis /
NK001(ka)036:534: bo dong pa u pa de kar dang lnga'o //
NK001(ka)036:535: . nas lo bcu tsam song nas me nyag sga'i yul du byon te /
NK001(ka)036:536: go rong seng ge grags la'ng 'dul ba gsan pas /
NK001(ka)036:537: lung sde bzhi bstan bcos dang bcas pa'i glegs bam
NK001(ka)036:538: bla chen po la sbyin nas bstan pa gsal bar
NK001(ka)036:540: . nas dbus su byon par bzhed pa la lho
NK001(ka)036:541: bal yul du chos mang por sbyangs pa'i kwa 'od
NK001(ka)036:542: mchog grags pa bya ba khams su byon zer ba
NK001(ka)036:544: phar phyin dang byang sa sogs theg pa chen po'i chos mang po la sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:545: bee ro'i slob ma g.yu sgra snying po la rdzogs chen sems phyogs gsan te /
NK001(ka)036:546: de las brgyud par rong zom la mnga' bar grags shing /
NK001(ka)036:547: kun byed rgyal po bshad rgyud bzhi dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)036:548: a ro'i lugs kyang bla chen po nas grum shing
NK001(ka)036:549: glag can la brgyud de deng sang gi bar du
NK001(ka)036:551: nam zhig gi tshe mnal lam du glang chen la
NK001(ka)036:552: chibs shing nor bu bsnams nas tshong 'dus kun tu
NK001(ka)036:553: byon pa la mi kun na re /
NK001(ka)036:554: btsun pa khyed kyi nor bu bzang ste /
NK001(ka)036:555: re zhig nyo ba'ng med rin yang mi theg zer /
NK001(ka)036:556: mnal sad nas re zhing sgrub pa mdzad par dgongs pa na /
NK001(ka)036:557: gzhi bdag gi mi ma yin rnams kyis dad pa
NK001(ka)036:558: chen pos 'byon par zhus pa ltar dan tig tu
NK001(ka)036:559: byon nas sgom pa la bzhugs shing /
NK001(ka)036:560: sa phyogs de dag tu gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten mang po yang bzhengs so //
NK001(ka)036:561: dad pa can mang po rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po'anga mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:562: brgya byin sogs lha rnams chos nyan du 'ong bar grags /
NK001(ka)036:563: 'khor rnams kyis kyang mdangs ngo mtshar ba'i snang ba
NK001(ka)036:564: 'di dang mi 'dra ba snang bas bla chen nyid
NK001(ka)036:565: nges par sprul pa'i sku lags sam zhus pas /
NK001(ka)036:566: lan du sprul pa ma yin /
NK001(ka)036:567: bdag ni theg pa chen po'i sbyor lam pa snang
NK001(ka)036:568: ba thob pa la zhugs pa'i ban+de dge ba rab
NK001(ka)036:570: .gung lo brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa shing phag gi
NK001(ka)036:571: lo la sku gshegs kar bka' 'phags pa thogs med
NK001(ka)036:572: dang mche ba'i sde gnyis kyis yum gyi dgongs pa
NK001(ka)036:574: . kho bos byams mgon la dri dgos te /
NK001(ka)036:575: slob dpon de gnyis kyang da lta dga' ldan na bzhugs zhes gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:576: yang kho bo byams pa mgon po 'dzam bu'i gling
NK001(ka)036:577: 'dir ma byon gyi bar du'anga 'di dag tu skye
NK001(ka)036:578: ba brgyad tsam len dgos gsungs nas dga' ldan du
NK001(ka)036:579: gshegs so // . yang bla chen po'i zhal nas /
NK001(ka)036:580: klu mes btsun pas mkhan po gyis /
NK001(ka)036:581: tshong ge blo rno bas ston pa gyis /
NK001(ka)036:582: 'bring bskos mkhas pas gnas gzhi zungs /
NK001(ka)036:583: lo ston mthu che bas bstan bsrung gyis /
NK001(ka)036:585: .bus gtsang gi mi bcu'i nang nas mkhan por mnga'
NK001(ka)036:586: gsol ba klu mes tshul khrims shes rab yin te
NK001(ka)036:587: / mdo smad kyi phyogs nas mkhan slob kyi bka'
NK001(ka)036:588: brgyud ma chad par 'dug ces thos pa dad nas
NK001(ka)036:589: mi dgu dang 'grogs te mdo smad du sdom pa
NK001(ka)036:590: len du phyin zhes kyang grags /
NK001(ka)036:591: bsam yas nas mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mi bcu khams su bardzangasa zhes kyang 'byung /
NK001(ka)036:592: gang ltar yang mdo smad song ste /
NK001(ka)036:594: gtsang rab gsal gyis las slob /
NK001(ka)036:596: smar sh+aakya mu ni dang rgya'i dge slong gnyis kyis
NK001(ka)036:597: kha bskangs te tshigs gsum dus gcig la bar ma
NK001(ka)036:599: sde snod kyi gzhung lugs dang 'dul ba'i lag len la mkhas par sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:600: gdams ngag mang po'anga nos te /
NK001(ka)036:602: kho bo cag dbus gtsang 'gro- bas mchod gnas shig zhu byas pas /
NK001(ka)036:603: .bu zhwa bzhes 'phro de ka phud nas 'di gyon
NK001(ka)036:604: la nga rjes su dran par gyis shig gsungs te
NK001(ka)036:605: dbu la bskon / yar byon te bsam yas na
NK001(ka)036:606: btsan po khri bya ba bzhugs pa la sna gtad
NK001(ka)036:608: btsan pos kyang sna len byas te khyed rnams kyi
NK001(ka)036:609: dpon gang yin zer ba la klu mes yin zhes
NK001(ka)036:610: smras bas dbu rtse'i lde mig gtad de dkor mdzod
NK001(ka)036:611: kyis gang bar gzigs nas der 'don mi thub pa'i
NK001(ka)036:613: nged mkhan por mngags pas mkhan po dkor la 'bags
NK001(ka)036:614: pa mi rigs pas 'di mi 'dzin zhes btsan po
NK001(ka)036:616: . nas khams gsum phul bas kyang ma bzhes /
NK001(ka)036:617: ka chu phul bas g.yu ru'i lam rgyags bya yi gsungs nas bzhes /
NK001(ka)036:618: phyis klu mes kyis yo byad mang po sta gon byas te dbu rtse gso bar bzhed pa na /
NK001(ka)036:619: sba rag gnyis kyis bzung bas gsor ma bcug /
NK001(ka)036:620: .ra btsan pos bar byas te klu mes kyis gsos /
NK001(ka)036:621: phyag rjes sba rag la gtod par byas te legs par gsos /
NK001(ka)036:623: mi chos kyi sa khul du ba gnas /
NK001(ka)036:624: gzhan yang la mo ra sgyel /
NK001(ka)036:626: tshong 'dus gnas sogs mtha' yas pa brtsigs pas sa
NK001(ka)036:627: steng thams cad klu mes dpon slob kyis gnas yam
NK001(ka)036:628: shud kyi mkhan bu dge bshes grwa pas kyang gnas
NK001(ka)036:629: gzhi brgya dang rtsa brgyad gting bar grags gsungs /
NK001(ka)036:632: }gas 'chang jo sras rnams kyis sngon 'gyur ba'i bka'
NK001(ka)036:633: bstan gyi glegs bam chud ma zos par sbas te
NK001(ka)036:634: bzung ba rnams de dag tu spyan drangs /
NK001(ka)036:635: dad pa can mang po mtsho la ngang pa 'du
NK001(ka)036:636: ba ltar 'dus nas nyin re bzhin yang rab tu
NK001(ka)036:637: byung ba'i dge 'dun gyi sde mang po 'phel ste
NK001(ka)036:638: / . yang gtso bor klu mes dang sna snam sogs ka ba bzhi /
NK001(ka)036:641: dral ma grangs las brgal ba byung bar grags /
NK001(ka)036:642: . ltar bstan pa yun ring du bskyangs mthar tshe
NK001(ka)036:643: spong gi ser phug par bzhugs nas thang du byon
NK001(ka)036:644: pa'i lam du sku gshegs te /
NK001(ka)036:645: gdung mchod rten 'od can mnyams par bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)036:646: de'i mkhan bu ka chu ba gzus rdo rje rgyal mtshan ni /
NK001(ka)036:647: gzhon nu nas gzhi dad pa rkyen gyis sad de /
NK001(ka)036:648: yongs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen klu mes kyis mkhan po dang /
NK001(ka)036:649: gru mer gyis las slob byas te rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:650: mkhan po'i drung du rgya cher 'grel dang bam po
NK001(ka)036:651: lnga bcu pa la sogs 'grel chen rnams la sbyangs
NK001(ka)036:652: pas mkhas pa chen por gyur /
NK001(ka)036:653: dus phyis rang gi mched grogs /
NK001(ka)036:654: lo ts+aa ba rlung skyo rnam gnyis la'ng 'chad nyan mdzad skad /
NK001(ka)036:655: rong zom dang po'i gnas gzhi ngang chung dpal gyi rgyal mos bzhengs /
NK001(ka)036:656: gsos te gtsug lag khang bzhengs shing /
NK001(ka)036:657: .ra 'dul ba'i bshad grwa gtsugs pa sogs bshad sgrub kyi bya bas bstan pa bskyangs te /
NK001(ka)036:658: sems can rnams bde ba la bko. /
NK001(ka)036:659: slob ma'ng bsam gyis mi khyab pa las thugs zin gyi bu chen bzhi ni /
NK001(ka)036:663: sbo chung tshul khrims 'byung gnas rnams so //
NK001(ka)036:664: de'i mkhan bu sne po grags pa rgyal mtshan ni /
NK001(ka)036:667: gzus las rab tu byung shing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:668: 'dul ba'i sde-snod la sbyangs te mkhas par byas nas /
NK001(ka)036:671: slob ma sog tshul khrims bla ma mkhas pa mang po thon //
NK001(ka)036:672: de'i mkhan bu 'bre shes rab 'bar ni /
NK001(ka)036:673: sne 0 las rab tu byung zhiiing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:674: 'dul ba'i sde snod la mkhas par sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:676: khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung gnyis dang bsdebs nas khams su byon te /
NK001(ka)036:677: jo bo se btsun la chos mang du gsan /
NK001(ka)036:678: khyad par du bstan pa snga dar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad 'gros la mchog tu mkhas /
NK001(ka)036:679: phyis rngog lo chen po la yang sher phyin 'chad
NK001(ka)036:680: nyan mdzad pas rngog lo'i thugs sras dam par gyur
NK001(ka)036:681: / skyo gnas snying sogs su chos gzhi bskor zhing /
NK001(ka)036:682: sher phyin mdo bstan gnyis ka la bshad pa rgya cher mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:683: chos 'chad pa'i tshe lha rnams chos nyan du 'ong bar yang grags /
NK001(ka)036:684: slob ma yang ar byang chub ye shes sogs bstan pa'i bdag po mtha' yas pa thon to //
NK001(ka)036:685: de'i mkhan bu bya 'dul ba 'dzin pa brtson 'grus 'bar ni /
NK001(ka)036:686: gtsang rong g.yung du lcags lug la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:687: 'bre chen po las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par
NK001(ka)036:688: rdzogs sog tshul khrims bla ma la 'dul ba gsan
NK001(ka)036:689: / khong gshegs rting rgya 'dul dang rma tsho bla
NK001(ka)036:690: zur du byas ba'i drung du sbyangs pas mkhas par
NK001(ka)036:691: / mkhyen te / 'dul ba bya la thugs zhes pa'i kha skad kyang byung /
NK001(ka)036:692: gzhan yang zhang g.yel ba las dbu tshad /
NK001(ka)036:693: zangs mkhar lo ts+aa ba la yo ga /
NK001(ka)036:694: stod lung pa chen po la bka' gdams rnams gsan /
NK001(ka)036:695: . rjes zul phur bshad grwa btsugs /
NK001(ka)036:696: be har gyi btsun chung ngu sprul nas zhabs tog
NK001(ka)036:697: byas pas 'dul ba dang 'gal ba na baza'i spu
NK001(ka)036:698: phyir bstan gcig pu las ma mthong bas dad de
NK001(ka)036:699: bya ti ka la slob gnyer byed pa rnams kyis
NK001(ka)036:701: lo dgur tshogs pa bskyangs rjes sgrub pa la bzhugs /
NK001(ka)036:702: slob ma 'gro don nus pa bdun cu rtsa drug tsam byung /
NK001(ka)036:703: .gung lo don drug pa la zul phu'i gzim chung du sku gshegs //
NK001(ka)036:704: de'i mkhan bu rtsis 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzhon nu seng ge ni /
NK001(ka)036:705: bya 'dul las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:706: 'dul ba'i sde snod la sbyangs pas shin tu mkhas par gyur te /
NK001(ka)036:707: bya 'dul phyi slob ma'i gtso bo yin /
NK001(ka)036:708: nyang stod mkhar lung du 'dul grwa bskyangs pas /
NK001(ka)036:709: bya'i snag dbon zul phu'i gdan sa ba rog 'di'i
NK001(ka)036:710: slob ma na bza' 'phreng gsol bar grags pa de
NK001(ka)036:711: yin / chos dbang sogs slob ma gshes gnyen mang po thon to //
NK001(ka)036:712: de'i mkhan bu dpal ldan gro mo che ba ni /
NK001(ka)036:713: bya'i lo la chu sgar du 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:715: rtsis 'dul ba las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'dul ba'i sde snod la sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:717: rdo ston dang zhang btsun las sha ra ba'i gdams pa rnams nos shing /
NK001(ka)036:723: grags phu lung pa 'jam dbyangs rgyal mtshan /
NK001(ka)036:726: chu nag pa rmar sh+aag seng /
NK001(ka)036:727: gtsang nag pa sogs las gsan pa rgya cher mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:728: sangs rgyas so lnga dang rje btsun sgrol ma sogs lhag pa'i lha mang po'i zhal gzigs /
NK001(ka)036:729: snar gdan rabs bzhi pa yin /
NK001(ka)036:730: thang gi gdan sar phebs nas lo sum bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du 'phrin las bskyangs /
NK001(ka)036:731: .gung lo brgyad cu pa la gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:732: de'i mkhan bu mchims chen nam mkha' grags ni /
NK001(ka)036:733: nyang stod stag tshal du rta'i lo la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:734: gzhon nu nas dpal ldan gro las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:735: sde snod kyi gzhung rnams mkhas bar sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:736: mdzod kyi t+aika chen sogs bstan bcos kyang mang du mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:739: mchims blo brtan sangs rgyas gdan rabs drug pa /
NK001(ka)036:740: sgom pa ste bzhi la bka' gdams kyi skor dang /
NK001(ka)036:741: bkra shis sgang pa la byang sems zla rgyal ba'i dbu ma'i gdams pa sogs gsan /
NK001(ka)036:742: chu mig chos 'khor gyi gral gyi gtso bo mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:743: 'gro mgon 'phags pa sogs che dgu thams cad kyis bkur /
NK001(ka)036:744: lhag pa'i lha du ma'i zhal gzigs /
NK001(ka)036:745: snar thang gi gdan sar lo sum gdan rabs bdun pa yin /
NK001(ka)036:746: cu rtsa drug gi bar du tshogs pa bskyangs nas byi ba'i lo la sku gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:747: de'i mkhan bu grags pa shes rab ni /
NK001(ka)036:748: nyang stod du lug gi lo la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:750: mkhan chen 'dul ba 'dzin pa grags pa brtson 'grus kyi gcung po yin /
NK001(ka)036:751: mchims chen po las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:752: mkhan po dang gcen las gzhung bshad dang gdams pa mtha' chod pa gsan /
NK001(ka)036:753: gcen 'dul 'dzin gyi rjes su mkhan por bzhugs nas
NK001(ka)036:754: lo bcu- gnyis kyi bar du gdan snar thang gi
NK001(ka)036:755: gdan rabs bcu gcig pa yin /
NK001(ka)036:757: de'i mkhan bu mkhan chen blo bzang grags pa ni /
NK001(ka)036:758: nyang stod smon gro'i phu kha'ura 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:759: gdung rus mchims sam ze'u pa /
NK001(ka)036:760: grags she las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:762: rgyang ro byang chub 'bum sogs bla mar brten /
NK001(ka)036:763: mdo sngags kyi gzhung gdams ngag ma lus pa la mkhyen rtogs rgyas /
NK001(ka)036:764: grags shes bas gdan sa gtad nas lo so dgu'i bar du bshad sgrub kyi bstan pa bskyangs /
NK001(ka)036:765: grwa sar sha khrims dang gling nang du khams pa
NK001(ka)036:766: mi brten pa sogs bca' khrims kyang dam par mdzad
NK001(ka)036:767: de yos lo la sku gshegs //
NK001(ka)036:768: de'i mkhan bu kun dga' rgyal mtshan ni /
NK001(ka)036:769: chu sgo'i lung bya bar stag gi lo lcags ri
NK001(ka)036:770: chen mo yang dpon snyan grags kyis 'di dus brtsigs
NK001(ka)036:773: mchims blo bzang grags pa las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas /
NK001(ka)036:774: gzhung gdams ngag thams cad dang bka' bcu gzhon seng sogs las kyang chos mang du gsan /
NK001(ka)036:775: mkhan po gshegs pa'i lo de ka la gdan sar
NK001(ka)036:776: phebs nas lo nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bar du
NK001(ka)036:777: bskyangs shing / bslab btus kyi t+ai ka sogs brtsams pa'ng mang du mdzad nas sbrul lo la gshegs //
NK001(ka)036:778: de'i mkhan bu grub pa shes rab ni /
NK001(ka)036:779: snar thang gi nye 'khor rong gu zhes par me bya la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:781: .gung lo bcu pa la kun rgyal pa las rab
NK001(ka)036:782: tu byung zhing mtshan grub pa shes rab tu btags
NK001(ka)036:783: / nyi shu pa la mkhan po de nyid dang /
NK001(ka)036:784: slob dpon grags pa rgya mtsho sogs dge 'dun gyi dbus su bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:787: slob dpon skal bzang pa sogs bla ma mang po
NK001(ka)036:788: bsten nas mod sngags kyi gzhung lugs gdams ngag dang
NK001(ka)036:789: bcas pa thugs su chud par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:790: .gung lo so gnyis pa la mkhan sar phebs nas lo sum cu bskyangs /
NK001(ka)036:791: . rting nyid kyi dbon po bsod nams mchog grub
NK001(ka)036:792: la gdan sa gtad de lo lnga zur bzhugs mdzad
NK001(ka)036:793: nas re bdun la sku gshegs /
NK001(ka)036:794: . ltar gro mo che pa nas grub she'i bar
NK001(ka)036:795: snar thang gi gdan sar phebs pa sha stag ste
NK001(ka)036:796: / dpal d+ai pam ka ras snar thang gi sa'i thad der phyag mdzub gtad de /
NK001(ka)036:797: sa pha gir gnas brtan chen po bcu drug byon /
NK001(ka)036:798: zhes lung bstan pa ltar gnas brtan gyi rnam 'phrul 'ba' zhig yin par gsungs so //
NK001(ka)036:799: de'i mkhan bu 'phags mchog spyan ras gzigs kyi rnam 'phrul pan chen dge 'dun grub ni /
NK001(ka)036:800: ru lag gi sa cha gur ma ru bar lcags lug la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:803: .gung lo bco lnga pa la snar thar du mkhan po grub pa shes rab dang /
NK001(ka)036:804: slob dpon gyang pa'i chen po blo ldan pas mdzad de dge tshul du bsgrubs /
NK001(ka)036:805: mtshan dge 'dun grub pa dpal bzang po zhes btags /
NK001(ka)036:806: .gung lo nyi shu pa la sngar gyi mkhan slob
NK001(ka)036:807: gnyis kyi steng gsang ston grags pa shes rab dang
NK001(ka)036:808: / dad pa'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su
NK001(ka)036:809: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bzhes
NK001(ka)036:810: / / thugs sbyong mdzad pa'i yongs 'dzin gyi gtso bo mkhan chen grub pa shes rab dang /
NK001(ka)036:811: snar thang pa shes rab seng ge /
NK001(ka)036:812: las smon gyis 'brel pa rje rin po che yab sras yin /
NK001(ka)036:813: gzhan yang kun bzang ngor ston /
NK001(ka)036:815: sems dpa' thugs rje dpal ba /
NK001(ka)036:817: gro sa'i dmar ston khu dbon /
NK001(ka)036:818: thang chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan /
NK001(ka)036:819: a b+ha ya don yod pas lung bstan pa'i bla ma 'chad ka'i lha rin po che dang /
NK001(ka)036:820: sgrol chen bsam 'grub rdo rje gnyis te /
NK001(ka)036:821: de la sogs pa'i bshes gnyen lnga bcu tsam brten
NK001(ka)036:822: nas mdo sngags rigs gnas dang bcas pa'i gzhung lugs
NK001(ka)036:823: thams cad la mkhyen pa rgyas shing rig pa'i dbang
NK001(ka)036:824: phyug chen por gyur pas bo dong pan chen gyis
NK001(ka)036:825: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol /
NK001(ka)036:826: snar thang byang chen du sgrub pa mdzad pas nyams rtogs kyang mthar phyin pa brnyes /
NK001(ka)036:827: 'jigs byed dang sgrol ma'i zhal gzigs /
NK001(ka)036:829: rtsa bar snar thang pa'i dge bshes /
NK001(ka)036:830: phyis rje'i grub mtha' 'dzin par byung yang /
NK001(ka)036:831: sde ris dang grub matha'i phyogs ris mi mdzad par kun la dag snang sbyong /
NK001(ka)036:832: mkhas pa'i bya ba dbu tshad 'dul ba sogs gzhung lugs mang por dgongs 'grel brtsams /
NK001(ka)036:833: bkra shis lhun po'i gtsug lag khang dang lha chen bzhengs shing dge 'dun mang du bsdus te /
NK001(ka)036:834: sku tshe hril por 'chad nyan gyis bstan pa bskyangs nas /
NK001(ka)036:835: .gung lo gya lnga pa shing rta la dga' ldan du gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:836: de'i mkhan bu gnas snying ba kun dga' bde legs ni /
NK001(ka)036:837: }na slob dpon pad+ma sam+b+ha wa'i dngos slob rgyang 'jam
NK001(ka)036:838: dpal gsang ba'i gdung rabs brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi
NK001(ka)036:839: bar thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdung
NK001(ka)036:840: rim par byon pa las yab rin chen rnams gnyis
NK001(ka)036:841: kyi sras su nyang sto. du 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:842: pan chen dge 'dun grub las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:843: mtshan kun dga' bde legs rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po bstsal /
NK001(ka)036:844: mkhan po'i drung du gzhung lugs gdams ngag dang bcas pa la mkhas par sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:845: 'bras spungs dang 'ol dga' sogs su yang phebs /
NK001(ka)036:846: nyang stod phyogs su blo gsal mang po'i don mdzad do //
NK001(ka)036:847: de'i mkhan bu thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho ni /
NK001(ka)036:848: rta nag rdo rje gdan du kun dga' rgyal mtshan pa'i sras su 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:849: .gung lo bcu pa la pan chen lung rig rgya mtshor gtsug phud phul /
NK001(ka)036:850: mtshan dge 'dun rgya mtsho zhes bstsal /
NK001(ka)036:851: lo de nyid- kyi nang du kun dka' bde legs pas mkhan po /
NK001(ka)036:852: pan chen lung rig rgya mtshos slob dpon /
NK001(ka)036:853: .bu mdzad sangs tshul bas dus go ba mdzad de dge tshul bzhes /
NK001(ka)036:854: .gung lo nyi shu pa yos lo dbo zla'i tshes brgyad la mkhan po snga ma nyid dang /
NK001(ka)036:855: las slob 'jam dbyangs legs pa chos 'byor /
NK001(ka)036:856: gsang ston sangs rgyas dpal bzang /
NK001(ka)036:857: dus go ba 'o la dga' sangs bzang sogs dad
NK001(ka)036:858: pa'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su bsnyen par
NK001(ka)036:859: rdzogs / tshigs snga phyi'i mkhan slob rnams dang /
NK001(ka)036:860: pan chen nor bzang rgya mtsho /
NK001(ka)036:862: pan chen ye shes rtse mo //
NK001(ka)036:863: na yon rgyam sogs bshes gnyen mang po bsten te /
NK001(ka)036:864: mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas pa'i gzhung lugs rab 'byams la sbyangs pas /
NK001(ka)036:865: tshig don mtha' dag thugs su chu. /
NK001(ka)036:866: rgyal me tog thang gi chos grwa btab /
NK001(ka)036:867: se 'bras bkra shis lhun po rnams kyi khrir phebs
NK001(ka)036:868: nas 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyi bya bas gdul bya
NK001(ka)036:869: bskyangs / .gung lo re brgyad pa chu stag nag
NK001(ka)036:870: zla'i tshes brgyad la dag pa'i zhing du sku gshegs
NK001(ka)036:871: bskyangs / // de'i mkhan bu bde ba can pa dge legs dpal bzang ni /
NK001(ka)036:872: yul 'ol dga' gyang gsar du shing glang lor 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:873: thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun rgya mtsho las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:876: rgyud stod rnams su mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs la sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:877: rgyud stod dang shar rtse'i gdan sa nas dgung lo nga bzhi pa la dga' ldan gyi khrir phebs /
NK001(ka)036:878: thams cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho'i bsnyen rdzogs bzhes pa'i mkhan po'anga yin /
NK001(ka)036:879: drug cu pa la bde ba can du zur bzhugs mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:880: re gsum pa la sku gshegs so //
NK001(ka)036:881: de'i mkhan bu rgyal khang rtse pa dpal 'byor rgya mtsho ni /
NK001(ka)036:882: yul stod lung ram pa'i gad pa khar me khyi la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:883: bde ba can pa las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:885: ra ba stod rgyud rnams kyi grwa sar gzhung lugs
NK001(ka)036:886: la sbyangs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spob pa thob
NK001(ka)036:887: / ra ba stod kyi 'chad nyan rgyud stod dang
NK001(ka)036:888: shar rtse sbrel ba'i bla nas nga bdun pa la
NK001(ka)036:890: re bzhi pa la rgyal khang rtser zur bzhugs mdzad
NK001(ka)036:891: de phrin las rnam par dkar ba'i ngang nas dgung
NK001(ka)036:892: lo don bzhi pa la sku gshegs //
NK001(ka)036:893: de'i mkhan bu 'jam dbyangs dkon mchog chos 'phel ni /
NK001(ka)036:894: grwa byams pa gling gi dgon zhol du chu bya la 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:895: chung ngu nas dwags po grwa tshang du gsan sbyongs la phebs /
NK001(ka)036:896: de'i slob dpon blo bzang chos 'phel las rab tu byung ste /
NK001(ka)036:897: mtshan dkon mchog chos 'phel du btags /
NK001(ka)036:898: . rjes ra ba stod dang rgyud sogs klog pa'i
NK001(ka)036:899: grwa mang por byon te 'chad nyan mdzad pas gzhung
NK001(ka)036:900: lugs rab 'byams smra ba'i dbang phyug tu gyur /
NK001(ka)036:901: .gung lo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la rgyal khang rtse pa las bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:902: ra ba stod dang rgyud stod blo gsal gling rnams kyi 'chad nyan /
NK001(ka)036:903: gsang phu gling gling smad kyi khrir shar rtse dang dga' ldan gyi khri rnams su phebs /
NK001(ka)036:904: rje thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal mchog lnga pas mtshan
NK001(ka)036:905: nyid kyi gzhung lugs rnams gsan nas ti sh+r+air bkur
NK001(ka)036:906: / 'chad mkhas shing thugs dgongs bzang bas zhal slob dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang du thon /
NK001(ka)036:907: rjes su slob ma thams cad tshul gnas lung rigs smra ba la sbyor /
NK001(ka)036:908: sde ris kyi chags sdang mi mnga' ba'i dbang gis
NK001(ka)036:909: sde gzar slong ba'i gros la rang mi 'jug cing
NK001(ka)036:910: gzhan dag kyang bsrung bar mdzad pas rang phyogs pa
NK001(ka)036:911: rnams kyis kyang gtsang zhen pa zhes phyogs 'bul zhu
NK001(ka)036:912: ba byung zhes rje thams cad mkhyen pas basngagasa par
NK001(ka)036:914: .gung lo don bzhi pa me khyi la dbur stod gsang sngags mkhar du sku gshegs //
NK001(ka)036:915: de'i mkhan bu don gyi slad du mtshan smos na bdag gi mkhan po dkon mchog bstan 'dzin ni /
NK001(ka)036:916: chu mo phag gi lo la dbu ru kha rag tu sku 'khrungs /
NK001(ka)036:917: 'jam dbyangs bla ma dkon mchog chos 'phel las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs /
NK001(ka)036:918: sku na phra mo grwa sar bzhugs dus nas bcas
NK001(ka)036:919: dang rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dus
NK001(ka)036:920: dbang gis 'byung bar nye ba rnams kyis kyang ma
NK001(ka)036:921: gos pas btsun gcig mar grags /
NK001(ka)036:922: ra ba bstod dang blo gsal gling sogs su mtshan nyid kyi gzhung lugs rnams la mkhas par sbyangs /
NK001(ka)036:923: rje rgyal ba'i dbang po lnga pa chen po dang
NK001(ka)036:924: rang gi mkhan po khri rin po che sogs bshes
NK001(ka)036:925: gnyen du ma las gzhung gdams ngag mang du gsan
NK001(ka)036:926: nas thugs su chud par mdzad /
NK001(ka)036:927: gnyal sde drug gi mkhan po lo bco lnga skor dang /
NK001(ka)036:928: . rjes nyang stod dpal 'khor lo bde chen gyi
NK001(ka)036:929: mkhan por phebs nas grub matha'i phyogs cha dang bral
NK001(ka)036:930: bar yun ring du bskyangs pas sa zhal dge gsum
NK001(ka)036:931: gyi grwa pa thams cad kyis spyi mi ltar bkur
NK001(ka)036:932: zhing basngagasa / . nas gdan sa yang stod pa
NK001(ka)036:933: ngag dbang phrin las la gtad de dbur stod gsang
NK001(ka)036:934: sngags mkhar du lo shas thugs dam la bzhugs nas
NK001(ka)036:935: dgung lo re gnyis pa shing pho byi ba la
NK001(ka)036:936: zhing basngagasa / sku gshegs so // de nyid kyi
NK001(ka)036:937: sdom phrug bdag mkhan po'i ming btags gnyos kyi dge
NK001(ka)036:939: mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa ye shes kyi sku
NK001(ka)036:940: can rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa gter chen chos
NK001(ka)036:941: kyi rgyal po dang sdom brtson mkhan chen po rgyal
NK001(ka)036:942: sras bstan pa'i nyi ma gnyis kyi rigs kyi gcung
NK001(ka)036:943: du skyees / gcen rnam gnyis kyi bka' drin gyi
NK001(ka)036:944: chung ngu nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che
NK001(ka)036:945: du skyees / dang mjal / khyad par rang lo
NK001(ka)036:946: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa lcags pho-spre'u'i lo'i dus tshigs
NK001(ka)036:947: lnga las dbyid zla dang po'i dus /
NK001(ka)036:948: dpyid 'bring nag zla'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum /
NK001(ka)036:949: nyin gyi dus su phyi dro'i nyi ma brgyad cha
NK001(ka)036:950: lus pa grib tshod skyes bu gcig dang rkang pa
NK001(ka)036:951: gnyis kyi dus su mkhan slob sbrags ma don gyi
NK001(ka)036:952: slad du mtshan nas smos na mkhan chen dkon mchog
NK001(ka)036:953: bstan 'dzin / gsang ston rab 'byams pa blo bzang skyes mchog /
NK001(ka)036:954: dus go ba rab 'byams pa phun tshogs legs 'byor /
NK001(ka)036:955: grogs dan pa dge slong blo bzang kun dga' /
NK001(ka)036:956: kha skong ba dge slong ngag dbang chos 'dzin te /
NK001(ka)036:957: dad pa'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su /
NK001(ka)036:958: rang byung 'phags pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po po ta lar /
NK001(ka)036:959: grogs rang gi gcung dang dge slong bzod pa bcas
NK001(ka)036:960: tshigs gsum dus gcig la bar ma chad pa'i cho
NK001(ka)036:961: gas bsnyen par rdzogs pas dge slong gi dngos po
NK001(ka)036:962: thob / . nyin bsgrub bya gnyis byung ba'i nged rnams dang po yin /
NK001(ka)036:963: cha gnyis pa la rta tshab rje drung rin po
NK001(ka)036:964: che'i zhabs phyi ba dge slong ngag dbang tshul khrims
NK001(ka)036:965: dang blo gsal rgya mtsho gnyis so //
NK001(ka)036:967: 'dul ba'i brda' chad dang lag len phran bu gcen
NK001(ka)036:968: rgyal pa'i sras po dang gung thang pan chen gnyis
NK001(ka)036:969: las sbyangs te sngon nas cung zad shes shing /
NK001(ka)036:970: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyi lo der gzhung lugs rab
NK001(ka)036:971: 'byams smra ba sangs rgyas chos dar las 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)036:972: bshad yam tsam zhig nyan nas bsam pa'i shes rab
NK001(ka)036:974: go ba'i sne zin tsam gyi bag chags bzhag pa lags so //
NK001(ka)036:975: da ni 'phros don thor bu barjoda par bya ste /
NK001(ka)036:976: brgyud yig rnying pa kha cig tu rba rat+na nas smar sh+aakya mu ne /
NK001(ka)036:977: g.yo- dge 'byung bla chen po zhes 'dren pa ni /
NK001(ka)036:978: smar g.yo gtsang gsum bka' drin che bas ngo mtshar brgyud pa lta bur gsum ka bgrangs pa las /
NK001(ka)036:979: bla chen gyi mtshan mthar rab gsal gyi 'khrul gzhi
NK001(ka)036:980: byas nas gtsang rab gsal chad par snang bas yi
NK001(ka)036:981: ge bris nor 'byams pa yin la /
NK001(ka)036:982: kha cig tu smar dang g.yo'i bar du'anga legs rin
NK001(ka)036:983: chen nam mkha' mdzod zer ba ni smar g.yo gtsang
NK001(ka)036:984: gsum ka rat+na'i mkhan bu yin par yongs su grags
NK001(ka)036:985: pas gnod do // yang bla chen po nas /
NK001(ka)036:991: bla chen po la sdom pa blangs nas byings yar log /
NK001(ka)036:992: klu mes kyis grum las 'dul ba nyan zhing bsdad do //
NK001(ka)036:993: zhes 'byung ba'i gtam rgyud thos shing ji bzhin pa ma 'khyol ba'i 'chal gtam mo //
NK001(ka)036:994: yang phyogs gtam can kha cig na re /
NK001(ka)036:995: bla chen mkhan brgyud ma dag ste /
NK001(ka)036:996: de'i rgyu mtshan bla chen bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i las
NK001(ka)036:997: kyi kha skong la rgya nag gi dge slong gnyis
NK001(ka)036:998: yod pa de rnam dag yin min mi shes pas
NK001(ka)036:999: / las chags ma chags the tshom za bas /
NK001(ka)036:1001: sdom pa 'khrungs ma 'khrungs the tshom za /
NK001(ka)036:1002: kha chen pan chen nas brgyud pa la de 'dra'i skyon med pas sdom brgyud dag pa yin no //
NK001(ka)036:1003: zhes smra ba mi rigs te spyir rgya'i dge slong
NK001(ka)036:1004: yin pas rnam dag ma yin par sgrub mi nus
NK001(ka)036:1005: shing / khyad par de gnyis lha lung dpal gyi
NK001(ka)036:1006: rdo rje chos rgyus shin tu che zhing bstan pa
NK001(ka)036:1007: rin po che mig gi 'bras bu ltar gces spras
NK001(ka)036:1009: rang nyid rgyal po sdig can bsad pas las kyi
NK001(ka)036:1010: kha skong mi btub par gzigs te kha skong bar
NK001(ka)036:1011: 'os pa'i dge slong 'bad pa chen pos btsal nas
NK001(ka)036:1012: btang bar yongs su grags shing grub pas na /
NK001(ka)036:1013: rnam dag yin min gyi the tshom ga la dgos /
NK001(ka)036:1014: lar dus phyis kyi mi the tshom che zos pas
NK001(ka)036:1015: sngon bla chen po'i thugs rgyud la sdom pa rnam
NK001(ka)036:1016: dag ma 'khrungs par sgrub pa ni bzhad gad kyi
NK001(ka)036:1017: gnas so // .ra ma zad bla chen brgyud pa ma dag na /
NK001(ka)036:1018: kha che'i pan chen gyis byang rdor rnam gnyis dang
NK001(ka)036:1019: 'jam dbyangs sa pan gsum bsnyen par rdzogs pa la'ng
NK001(ka)036:1021: rgyu mtshan byang chub dpal ba'i las slob shangs pa jo ston dang /
NK001(ka)036:1022: gsang ston rgyang ro gzhon rin /
NK001(ka)036:1023: rdo rje dpal ba'i las slob gtsang po pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1025: 'jam dbyangs sa pan gyi las slob spyi bo lhas pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1026: gsang ston mo ri ba rnams pan chen bod du
NK001(ka)036:1027: ma byon gong du bsnyen par rdzogs zin pa'i bla
NK001(ka)036:1028: chen brgyud pa yin dgos la de yin na khyod
NK001(ka)036:1029: rang gi rigs pa des pan chen sdom rgyun kyang
NK001(ka)036:1030: ma dag par khas blangs par 'gyur ro //
NK001(ka)036:1031: yang kha cig bla chen dang klu mes kyi sdom
NK001(ka)036:1032: pa gang las blangs pa'i mkhan po la mi mthun
NK001(ka)036:1033: pa'i lo rgyus sna tshogs byung ba'i phyir /
NK001(ka)036:1034: yid ches ba'i gnas su rung ba ye mi 'dug pas /
NK001(ka)036:1035: kha che pan chen sh+aakya sh+r+ai'i mkhan brgyud la mkhas
NK001(ka)036:1036: pa rnams thugs rtsis chen po mdzad ces bris nas
NK001(ka)036:1039: bdag nyid chen po bzang po dpal dang /
NK001(ka)036:1041: mkhas mchog bu ston rnams kyis pan chen sdom brgyud las bsnyen rdzogs bzhes pa bkod do //
NK001(ka)036:1043: lo rgyus mi 'dra ba ni pan chen sdom brgyud la'ng mang ste /
NK001(ka)036:1044: rat+na mi tra'i rjes su d+harma p+aa la ste chos
NK001(ka)036:1045: skyong zhes yin pa la chos bzang zer ba dang
NK001(ka)036:1046: de rjes su gu na pa ti ste yon tan
NK001(ka)036:1048: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes kha cig tu 'byung ba dang /
NK001(ka)036:1049: byang rdor rnam gnyis chu shul gyi sprog ma dgon
NK001(ka)036:1050: par dus gcig la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa
NK001(ka)036:1051: dang / yang byang chub dpal ba khro phu lo ts+aa ba'i gzim khang du rdzogs la /
NK001(ka)036:1052: rdo rje dpal pa phyis rgyan gong du rdzogs pas dus mi gcig zer ba dang /
NK001(ka)036:1053: yang tshogs chen po'i mkhan po yar 'brog sgrags mnga'
NK001(ka)036:1054: ba bkra shis tshul khrims sam rtsis pa sher mgon
NK001(ka)036:1055: pa'i sdom phrug tu 'dod pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1056: snye mo ba bsod nams dpal gyi sdom phrug tu
NK001(ka)036:1057: 'dod pa gnyis kyang 'gal ba sogs de rigs kyi
NK001(ka)036:1058: gtam rgyud ma dag pa gnyis ka la yod bzhin
NK001(ka)036:1059: du bla chen sdom brgyud kho na la skyon 'dogs
NK001(ka)036:1060: pa ni / gzhan la blta ba'i mig yod kyang /
NK001(ka)036:1061: rang nyid blta na me long dgos pas btsal bar rigs so //
NK001(ka)036:1062: bdag nyid chen po sa skya pan+di ta dang kun
NK001(ka)036:1063: mkhyen bu ston kha che pan chen brgyud pa las
NK001(ka)036:1064: bsnyen rdzogs bzhes pa bden mo. /
NK001(ka)036:1065: . lta bu'i mkhas grub bla chen brgyud pa la'ng ches mang ste /
NK001(ka)036:1071: sha mi smon lam rdo rje sogs 'dul 'dzin khyad par can mang po- dang /
NK001(ka)036:1072: lo chen mkhan po ye shes bzang po /
NK001(ka)036:1074: pu mkhan po rgya lha khang pa'i glan /
NK001(ka)036:1076: phu chung mkhan po rgyal lha khang pa'i zhang /
NK001(ka)036:1078: 0 / sha ra ba mkhan po bo to ba /
NK001(ka)036:1079: rngog lo ts+aa ba chen po blo ldan shes rab /
NK001(ka)036:1080: 'bring gi mkhan po rngog legs shes /
NK001(ka)036:1082: sne po grags pa rgyal mtshan /
NK001(ka)036:1083: dwags mkhan po sha ba gling pa /
NK001(ka)036:1087: bcom ldan 'das rig ral sogs mtha' yas so //
NK001(ka)036:1088: .sa na sngon gyi mkhas grub rgyal ba gnyis pa
NK001(ka)036:1089: lta bu'i skyes mchog khyad par can rnams kyi thugs
NK001(ka)036:1090: rgyud la sdom pa rnam dag 'khrungs ma 'khrungs kyi
NK001(ka)036:1091: kha tshon gcod pa ni mtha' bral gyi nam mkha'
NK001(ka)036:1092: khab mig tu 'dzud par 'dod pa dang 'dra bas
NK001(ka)036:1094: mdor na sngar bstan pa rgyas pa'i dus su stod 'dul smad 'dul /
NK001(ka)036:1095: kha che brgyud pa'i sdom rgyun thams cad la gnas
NK001(ka)036:1096: brtan sde snod 'dzin pa ches cher mchog tu gyur
NK001(ka)036:1097: pa'i mkhan rabs mang du byung mo. /
NK001(ka)036:1098: de las stod 'dul ba p+aa la rnam gsum gyi
NK001(ka)036:1099: sdom rgyun ni sngon gyi dus su'anga rgyun breng nge
NK001(ka)036:1100: ba gcig las rgya cher ma 'phel zhing ding sang
NK001(ka)036:1101: ni yod pa'i sgra mi grag go //
NK001(ka)036:1102: pan chen sdom rgyun kyang tshogs sde bzhi las /
NK001(ka)036:1103: .nga sang byings rdzing ba'i sdom rgyud phyogs gang na yang yod pa ma thos shing /
NK001(ka)036:1104: gzhan gsum gyi sdom rgyun rang rang gi tshogs der ma chad mo. /
NK001(ka)036:1106: dge 'dun sgang pa'i sdom rgyun kar lugs pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1107: chos lung pa'i sdom rgyun 'brug lugs pa 'dra la ma chad pa tsam yod par grags shing /
NK001(ka)036:1108: tshal mig pa'i sdom rgyun ngor chen rdo rje 'chang
NK001(ka)036:1109: kun dga' bzang po las brgyud nas deng sangs lugs
NK001(ka)036:1110: pa rnams la dar rgyas che /
NK001(ka)036:1111: kha che pan chen gyi lugs 'jam dbyangs sa skya
NK001(ka)036:1112: pan+di ta nas brgyud de kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang
NK001(ka)036:1113: po lnga pa chen po'i phrin las kyis rgyas par
NK001(ka)036:1114: mdzad pa dang / smad 'dul ba'i sdom rgyun thams
NK001(ka)036:1115: cad mkhyen pa bsod nams rgya mtsho nas brgyud pa
NK001(ka)036:1116: pan chen chos kyi rgyal po'i phrin las kyis rgyas
NK001(ka)036:1118: . ltar sdom rgyun gnyis po 'di deng sangs rgya
NK001(ka)036:1119: bod hor gsum sogs phyogs thams cad du dar zhing
NK001(ka)036:1121: smad 'dul ba'i lugs de las brgyud pa'i khyad par
NK001(ka)036:1122: cung zad mi 'dra ba 'di nyid shin tu nyag
NK001(ka)036:1123: phra bar gyur pa na gong ma thams cad mkhyen
NK001(ka)036:1124: gzigs rgyal mchog lnga pa chen po'i bka' lung gis
NK001(ka)036:1125: bla chen sdom rgyun rnam par dag pa kha rag
NK001(ka)036:1126: zhal snga nas la bzhugs shing /
NK001(ka)036:1127: khong 'dul ba'i ngang tshul shin tu gtsang bas snga
NK001(ka)036:1128: 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i 'brel dang bcas khyed kyis zhus
NK001(ka)036:1129: nas ma nub par gyis shig ces stsal ba ltar
NK001(ka)036:1130: bsgrubs pas 'dun ma legs pa yin no //
NK001(ka)036:1132: 'jam dbyangs sa pan nas brgyud pa 'di nyid sngon dus skyes chen mang du byon zhing /
NK001(ka)036:1133: da lta'i dus su ni gnas brtan sde snod 'dzin
NK001(ka)036:1134: pa'i skyes mchog dam pa mang du snang mod kyis
NK001(ka)036:1135: / 'on kyang bar skabs kyi mkhan rabs 'ga' zhig
NK001(ka)036:1136: mtshan ma nub tsam las kun gyis mthun snang du
NK001(ka)036:1137: grub pa'i bshes gnyen grags che ba ma byung ba
NK001(ka)036:1138: / dang / ngor lugs kyi mkhan brgyud rnams kyang
NK001(ka)036:1139: sngags kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bshes gnyen brgyud mar
NK001(ka)036:1140: byon kyang 'dul ba'i phyogs la phyag bzhes cung zad
NK001(ka)036:1141: / dang / lhod pa bcas / . rnams dang
NK001(ka)036:1142: bstun na da lta'i dus 'dir bla chen po'i sdom
NK001(ka)036:1143: rgyun khyad par can 'di nyid ches 'phags par grub
NK001(ka)036:1145: gyi slad du mtshan nas smos na bdag gi mkhan
NK001(ka)036:1146: po dkon mchog bstan 'dzin yan chad mkhan brgyud thams
NK001(ka)036:1147: cad gnas brtan sde snod 'dzin pa sha stag gser
NK001(ka)036:1148: ri'i phreng ba ltar bzang za ra tshags su byon
NK001(ka)036:1149: pa ni kun gyi mthun snang du grub pa 'di
NK001(ka)036:1150: / dang / lhod pa bcas / ste / yin
NK001(ka)036:1151: zhing / gzhan du na sdom rgyun lugs so so
NK001(ka)036:1152: de dang de'i mkhan brgyud la bzhugs pa'i bla ma
NK001(ka)036:1153: rnams kyi thugs rgyud kyi spangs rtogs skye 'phags gang
NK001(ka)036:1154: yin ni bdag cag so skyes rnams kyi su ci
NK001(ka)036:1156: 'phags pa'i spyod yul las gzhan gyis rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK001(ka)036:1157: gzhan yang smad 'dul ba 'di la sdom rgyun tsam du ma zad /
NK001(ka)036:1158: }na gyi skyes mchog rnams kyi thugs bskyed rmad du
NK001(ka)036:1159: byung ba'i mthu las bshad rgyud kyang dus kyi tha
NK001(ka)036:1160: ma'i tha ma da lta'i bar du dar shing rgyas
NK001(ka)036:1161: par yod cing / stod 'dul ba'i bshad rgyud kyang
NK001(ka)036:1162: gzus rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis lo ts+aa ba rlung
NK001(ka)036:1163: skyogs gnyis la 'chad nyan mdzad pas smad 'dul ba'i
NK001(ka)036:1164: bshad rgyun la 'dres pa'i phyir ma chad par snang
NK001(ka)036:1165: par yod cing / ngo // . ltar na dngos
NK001(ka)036:1166: cag gis kyang rang la nus pa ma mchis rung
NK001(ka)036:1167: par yod cing / ngo // / dam pa rnams
NK001(ka)036:1168: kyi byin rlabs cung zad zhugs pas mkhan po'i g.yar
NK001(ka)036:1169: khral blangs nas gang spobs kyis spel lo bgyis par
NK001(ka)036:1170: par yod cing / ngo // / / da lta'i
NK001(ka)036:1171: lcags sbrul gyi lo 'di yan la sdom phrug dge
NK001(ka)036:1172: slong nyis brgya lhag tsam dang /
NK001(ka)036:1173: dge tshul stong phrag brgal ba tsam du zin pa
NK001(ka)036:1174: ni chos ldan gyi phrin las su rloms pa lags
NK001(ka)036:1175: pas / phyis nas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas
NK001(ka)036:1176: btsun bzang po'i yon tan mnga' ba rnams kyis gcig
NK001(ka)036:1177: tu bstan pa la dgongs te /
NK001(ka)036:1178: mkhan po gtan med kyi lung tsam la 'khris nas
NK001(ka)036:1179: dge slong bzhi tshogs kyis bsnyen rdzogs 'bogs pa dang
NK001(ka)036:1180: / bsgrub bya lo bdun dang nyi shu ma lon par rab byung bsnyen rdzogs ster ba dang /
NK001(ka)036:1181: bsgrub bya gsum las mang bar dus gcig tu sdom pa 'bogs pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1182: gos byin rlabs mkhan po las gzhan dag gis kyang bye.- pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1183: las cho ga dpe klog byed pa dang /
NK001(ka)036:1184: las grwa rnams kyisakyanga cho ga la thugs mi gtod par /
NK001(ka)036:1187: las grwa gyes nas las slob kyi gdams ngag zur
NK001(ka)036:1188: du 'debs pa sogs zor yang mi mdzad par phra
NK001(ka)036:1189: zhib kyi phyag len rnam par dag ba 'di nyid
NK001(ka)036:1190: mi nyams shing gong 'phel du 'gyur ba'i sgo nas
NK001(ka)036:1191: spyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyir dang khyad par mkhan
NK001(ka)036:1192: chen zhi ba 'tsho'i ring lugs rgyas par bya ba'i
NK001(ka)036:1193: phyir dang / nges 'byung gi tshul khrims don du
NK001(ka)036:1194: gnyer ba'i blo ldan rnams kyi rgyu.-chud mi gzon par
NK001(ka)036:1195: bskyang ba la nan tan du mdzod cig ces gsol
NK001(ka)036:1196: phyir dang / ba 'debs so // de ltar nyung ngu'i ngag gi sbyor ba yis //
NK001(ka)036:1197: ngo mtshar rgya chen gtam la dabnga bsgyur ba'i //
NK001(ka)036:1198: mkhan brgyud rnam par gsal byed sgron me 'di //
NK001(ka)036:1199: chos khungs blta 'dod dapala du 'gyur snyam spel //
NK001(ka)036:1200: dge 'dis nges 'byung tshul khrims grur zhugs te //
NK001(ka)036:1201: bag yod mthun pa'i rlung gis legs bskul nas //
NK001(ka)036:1202: don mthun ma gyur 'gro dang lhan cig tu //
NK001(ka)036:1203: rnam grol gling du ba de bar phyin gyur cig /
NK001(ka)036:1204: ces snga 'gyur sdom rgyun gyi mkhan brgyud ji ltar
NK001(ka)036:1205: byon pa'i gtam nyung gsal sgron me zhes bya ba
NK001(ka)036:1206: 'di ni rnam par dpyod pa'i blo can rnam la
NK001(ka)036:1207: chos khungs kyi nges ba sbyin pa'i slad du tshul
NK001(ka)036:1208: 'di lta bu zhig rtsom zhes rgyal kun spyi gzugs
NK001(ka)036:1209: skyabs mgon bla ma dam pa gter chen chos kyi
NK001(ka)036:1210: rgyal po'i bka' gnang ba stsal ba spyi bos blangs
NK001(ka)036:1211: te / gang gi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba'i smyos
NK001(ka)036:1212: kyi dge slong d+harma sh+r+ais o rgyan smin grol gling
NK001(ka)036:1213: gi chos grwar khyu mchog gi lo la sbyar ba'o
NK001(ka)036:1214: te / // 'dis kyang mkhan chen zhi ba 'tsho'i
NK001(ka)036:1215: ring lugs rnam par dag pa yun ring du gnas
